statements: SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM product_bundles;
SELECT product_id, quantity, customer_id FROM product_bundles;
SELECT quantity, customer_id, product_id FROM product_bundles;
SELECT customer_id, quantity, product_id FROM product_bundles;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, quantity FROM product_bundles;
SELECT * FROM product_bundles WHERE customer_id = 101 AND product_id = 201 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product_bundles GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM product_bundles GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_quantity;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM product_bundles WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM product_bundles GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY num_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_bundles WHERE bundle_id = 2;
SELECT bundle_name, products FROM product_bundles ORDER BY bundle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM product_bundles WHERE bundle_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN product_bundles pb ON c.customer_id = pb.bundle_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchases.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT bundle_id, bundle_name, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(products_list) AS num_products FROM bundles;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'Alice';
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT bundle_name, json_array_elements_text(products_list) AS product_name FROM bundles;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT bundle_id, bundle_name, discount FROM product_bundles WHERE discount > 0;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_details.quantity, order_details.unit_price FROM orders JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = order_details.product_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 1;
SELECT bundle_name, description FROM product_bundles WHERE discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY bundle_name ASC;
